Commentary: starts with a length ball outside off, Tamim pushes it gently towards point
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: a high full toss, catches Tamim by surprise, and hitting the batsman high on the bat, called a no-ball
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 no ball

Commentary: shuffles in his crease, takes his front leg out and looks to go over the bowler's head, it was full, around off and shapes away a bit as Tamim finds thin air
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: length ball this time, Tamim pushes it towards midwicket for a couple, first runs off the bat
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

Commentary: a low full toss, wide outside off, once again a hint of movement in the air but Tamim comes forward, leans it the drive and sends it to the cover boundary
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: length outside off, a deft touch this time past first slip as he waits for it to come on to the ball, some quick running there makes a comfortable brace
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

Commentary: length, just around off, Tamim comes forward and drops it on the off side, Liton was charging down for a single but Cottrell was quick to get to the ball, prevents the single there
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: length ball, on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg, Liton is off the mark as well
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: short of length, Tamim was pushing at it and gets almost squared up there, the leading edge flies towards cover, away from the fielder though
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

Commentary: length again but on the pads this time, flicked towards square leg for two more
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

Commentary: short of length, angling across this time, drops it towards cover-point
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: length, outside off, Tamim is guilty of pushing at it, gets a healthy outside edge past the wide first slip
Commentary_short: Thomas to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: bouncer this time and Liton ducks under it easily, a dot ball to end the over
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: dropped, was a length ball, Tamim was pushing at it, ends up hitting it in the air towards cover, Fabian Allen mistimes his dive, gets his hand but fails to latch on
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: length, angling across, Liton backs away as well to give himself some room, cuts it up and over cover-point for four
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: length this time, backs away once more and looks to smash it down the ground, doesn't middle it properly which robs it off the power, Brathwaite at mid-on makes a sliding stop to his left
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: a touch fuller around off, Liton moves across this time and scoops it fine, gets another boundary
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: Liton is on a roll here, a slower one, around 112kph, Liton backs away and carves it past the cover fielder for the third boundary of the over. Brathwaite having a chat with his bowler
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: is it a drop? Was a length ball around off, Liton punches it on the up towards point, was in the air but not sure if it carried to the point fielder
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: length outside off, steered towards cover-point
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: length again, some width outside off, Tamim moves towards the off stump and looks to guide it past the short third man fielder, fails to beat him
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: back of length, on the body, dabbed towards square leg for a single
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, Liton was backing away but the bowler follows him, cramping the batsman for the room, extra bounce as well, Liton looks to work it on the leg side, gets struck on the body
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: a touch fuller and on the pads, Liton picks it up and sends it over fine leg boundary, all the way for a 69-metre six
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: pulled away this time. Was a length ball, Liton backs away and pulls it over square leg this time, back to back sixes as Bangladesh are off to a flying start here in Dhaka. Liton moves to 25 off just ten
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: fuller but way down the leg side as Tamim misses the flick, given a wide
Commentary_short: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

Commentary: Tamim was struggling for the timing from ball one and pays the price with his wicket as he looks to hit this length ball over the short midwicket fielder, doesn't get the timing or elevation right and ends up dragging it straight to Cottrell
Commentary_short: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, OUT
Dismissal_text: Tamim Iqbal c Cottrell b Allen 15 (16b 1x4 0x6) SR: 93.75

Commentary: length on middle and leg, goes back and punches it towards long-on, off the mark straightaway
Commentary_short: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: slower in the air, just outside off, Liton wrists it towards square leg, Soumya was charging down the other end, but Liton sends him back, a better throw and it would have been curtains for Soumya
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: length outside off, goes down and sweeps it over the square leg fielder for four
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: short of length outside off, some turn as well, Liton was looking to cut it away, ends up chopping it into the ground off the toe end
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: flatter outside off, looks to slog sweep it over wide long-on, gets off-balance and fails to connect
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: fuller on the stumps, driven from the crease but straight to the extra cover fielder
Commentary_short: Thomas to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: pitched up once again, on middle and leg, clipped towards the left of mid-on
Commentary_short: Thomas to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: pitched up once more, Liton backs away, clears his front leg and a free swing of the arms sends it over the straight boundary for his third six of the evening
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: another one, this time in the opposite direction, fuller outside off, Liton moves across, gets inside the line and scoops it over fine leg, crashes into the advertising board on the full
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, SIX runs

Commentary: Thomas finally pulls his length back, Liton was backing away and looking to go aerial, down the ground, misses
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: short of length outside off, backs away and goes for an upper cut, but it's way too high. Well, it's a no ball, free hit coming up
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, 1 no ball

Commentary: again a short one outside off, Liton backs away and throws his bat at it, no connection once more. 61 from the Power Play
Commentary_short: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: length on middle and leg, tucked away behind square for one
Commentary_short: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: length outside off, goes back and pulls it towards deep midwicket for a couple
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, 2 runs

Commentary: slower in the air this time, length around off, Liton was looking to work it on the leg side but had to defend it in the end
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: this one coming slower off the wicket, Liton was early into the pull, ends up hitting it in the air, one bounce to the charging in deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: down the track but Allen shortens his length, Soumya pushes it back in the end
Commentary_short: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: short of length, goes back and pulls it hard but there is protection at deep square leg
Commentary_short: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: floats it wide outside off, Soumya reaches out and hits it towards mid-off
Commentary_short: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: fuller outside off, driven uppish towards deep extra cover for a single
Commentary_short: Paul to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: fuller on the stumps, Soumya looks to work it on the leg side, ends up hitting it onto his pad, gets a single as the ball rolls towards covers
Commentary_short: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: full outside off, Liton digs it out towards point, straight to the fielder who lets it go through his legs, Hetmyer the culprit
Commentary_short: Paul to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: short of length, Soumya swivels on the front foot and pulls it towards deep square leg, beating the man patrolling the fence on his left
Commentary_short: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: short of length outside off, sticking in the wicket, worked towards square leg for one
Commentary_short: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: fuller outside off, a crisp drive, a lot of bottom hand involved there, but straight to the extra cover fielder
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: length around off, Soumya was looking to muscle it down the ground, the bat rotates in his hands as the ball rolls towards mid-on
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: fuller, angling on the pads, flicked away towards fine leg
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: a full toss wide outside off, Soumya throws his bat at it, a single to sweeper cover
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: down the ground, away from the stumps and hits it inside out over mid-off, one bounce over the boundary to bring up his fifty off just 26 balls
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: full and way down the leg side
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Liton Das, 1 wide

Commentary: a loopy bouncer, around 133 kph, Liton ducks under
Commentary_short: Brathwaite to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: fuller, following the batsman who backs away, lofted towards wide long on for one
Commentary_short: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: a full toss this time, Liton was looking to back away but adjusts and opens the face of the bat at the last moment to steer it towards the third man boundary
Commentary_short: Paul to Liton Das, FOUR runs

Commentary: uppish and another misses catch, was fuller outside off, Liton clears his front leg and smashes it past extra cover, Bravo flung himself on his right, got his hand to hit but this was smashed hard
Commentary_short: Paul to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: a full toss outside off, and Soumya creams it through extra cover for four
Commentary_short: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: full and angled down the leg side, another wide
Commentary_short: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

Commentary: short of length on middle and leg, Soumya uses the pace and pulls it behind square for four more, turning out to be another big over, already 15 from it
Commentary_short: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: another full toss, on middle and leg, clipped towards deep square leg, Bangladesh 99 for 1 at the halfway stage. Can they reach the 200-run mark?
Commentary_short: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: slower in the air, around middle and leg, and almost lobbed to the short fine leg, one bounce to his right, brings up the 100
Commentary_short: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: short of length outside off, goes back and pulls it towards deep square leg
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: length outside off, waits for it before guiding it towards short third man for a quick single
Commentary_short: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: length ball, Liton backs away, Allen angles it towards the batsman, keeps a bit low, cut it towards the left of long-off
Commentary_short: Allen to Liton Das, 1 run

Commentary: down the ground, Allen bowls it short but Soumya goes with the shot, a beautiful sound off the bat as he pulls it over deep midwicket, and it was always going to clear the fence after that sound
Commentary_short: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

Commentary: a touch fuller, played with soft hands towards square leg this time
Commentary_short: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

Commentary: taken on the second attempt, Carlos Brathwaite pulls out a stunner. Was a length ball, Soumya backed away and looked to smash it over extra cover, Brathwaite there jumps in the air, gets his right hand to it, the ball lobs over his head, he turns around and dives to take it with both hands. A salute by the bowler, most likely to his captain on this occasion
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, OUT
Dismissal_text: Soumya Sarkar c Brathwaite b Cottrell 32 (22b 3x4 1x6) SR: 145.45

Commentary: fuller outside off, pushed back towards the bowler
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: slower length ball this time, Shakib works it towards square leg
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: a full toss angling towards the batsman, tucked away towards square leg but fielder was quick to the ball
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, no run

Commentary: a slower one this time, Liton flicks it towards deep square leg for a couple
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, 2 runs

Commentary: a touch fuller this time, angling towards the batsman, skidding after pitching, Liton was backing away to cut it but it crashed into the stumps before he could bring his bat down, end of a brilliant innings from Liton
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Liton Das, OUT

Commentary: fuller outside off, clears his front leg and hits it over mid-off for his first boundary
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: length around off, punched down the ground towards long-off
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: length outside off, jumping at Mushfiqur who takes off the bottom hand as the ball hits almost on the handle and lobs towards square leg

Commentary: length on middle and leg, worked towards long-on
Commentary_short: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: length outside off, keeps a little low this one, Mushfiqur was looking to run it down, misses
Commentary_short: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

Commentary: looked like a decent contact at first but it came off the bottom part of the bat. Was a fuller one on middle and leg, Mushfiqur cleared his front leg and looked to go over midwicket, didn't get the distance as Allen took a good catch at deep midwicket. Allen perhaps indicating there he lost it in the floodlights but did well stay calm and pouch it
Commentary_short: Thomas to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mushfiqur Rahim c Allen b Thomas 1 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 33.33

Commentary: length outside off, some room as well, Mahmudullah stays back and cuts it to the deep point boundary

Commentary: down the track and lofted over extra cover, crashed for one bounce four, he's off as well

Commentary: three-in-three, length ball, angling across, cuts it hard past the diving point fielder, on his left, for his third four in as many balls
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

Commentary: slower one on middle and off, 102 kph, defended towards point
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mahmudullah, no run

Commentary: length outside off, punches it hard but straight to the point fielder this time, a metre either side of the fielder and it would have been another four

Commentary: another slower one, 106 kph this time, length outside off, pushed towards covers
Commentary_short: Cottrell to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: length outside off, skips down the track and works it towards deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: short of length, on middle and leg, backs away and cuts it towards point
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: short of length outside off, backs away and cuts it towards deep extra cover
Commentary_short: Allen to Mahmudullah, 1 run

Commentary: short again, punches it to sweeper cover for one more

Commentary: fuller outside off, digs it out towards deep cover-point

Commentary: fired again but way down the leg side
Commentary_short: Allen to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 wide

Commentary: fuller outside off, lofts it towards sweeper cover for another single

Commentary: down the leg side, Shakib swings at it, the balls hits the pads and goes towards fine leg, Thomas charges in but overruns and lets it go for the boundary

Commentary: bouncer on the leg stump but way too high

Commentary: fuller around off, throws his bat at it but doesn't get the timing right, straight to extra cover

Commentary: a full toss and middle and leg, easy pickings as Shakib helps it behind square, bounces just inside the boundary

Commentary: fuller outside off, way too outside as Shakib looks to go aerial, misses

Commentary: fuller on middle and leg, hits it towards long-on along the ground

Commentary: almost a yorker from around the wicket, digs it out towards deep midwicket for a couple

Commentary: way too down the leg side, a bit of a casual effort from the keeper, gets the gloves to it but fails to make a stop

Commentary: fuller outside off, Shakib flashes hard at it, gives himself room but gets an outside edge which just evades the keeper
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: a low full toss outside off, toe-ends it towards extra cover
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

Commentary: another wide yorker but way too wide this time even if Shakib was moving towards the off stump

Commentary: slower one on the stumps, moves across and lobs it over short fine leg for four
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: fuller outside off this time, Shakib drags it from there towards deep square leg, a couple of bounces and over the boundary
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

Commentary: a yorker on off stump, jams his bat and opens the face to sneak in a single to short third man
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: fuller on the stumps, Mahmudullah comes down the track and steers it through covers, a bit of footwork by the fielder in the deep to stop it just inside

Commentary: down the track and lofts it over the bowler's head, gets only the height, not the distance, lands between the incoming long-on and long-off

Commentary: bouncer this time, goes for the pull, gets a top-edge that clears the short fine leg

Commentary: backs away, the bowler fires it full and wide outside off, Mahmudullah knows the drills, reaches out and opens the face to get it past the short third man

Commentary: slower length ball this time, a controlled pull towards deep square leg for one

Commentary: short and wide, Shakib goes up and over point, but there is a fielder in the deep

Commentary: it's all going Bangladesh's way, a short of length ball, Mahmudullah goes for the pull, gets a top-edge which goes over the keeper's head for four more, 16 from that over

Commentary: wide full toss, Shakib reaches out, ends up hitting it in the air, lands safe between extra cover and mid-off

Commentary: Mahmudullah was initially looking to go towards the leg side, seeing this Brathwaite fires one full and down but Mahmudullah stays in his position in the end

Commentary: fuller but down the leg side once more, Mahmudullah swings but no connection, 200 is up for Bangladesh

Commentary: fuller, almost in the blockhole, clears his front leg and swings it behind square

Commentary: a high full toss, a mistimed pulled towards wide long-on
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

Commentary: and he bowls full outside off, driven straight to extra cover

Commentary: full outside off, lofts it towards long-on, loses his shape and ends up not timing it well enough

Commentary: a full toss, Shakib tried to be a bit cheeky there, was looking to steer it through slips, fails to connect

Commentary: in the blockhole, digs it out towards extra cover
Commentary_short: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

Commentary: a high full toss outside off, works it past deep extra cover for a boundary to end with, Mahmudullah is checking with the umpires if it was too high. No, they say

Commentary: straightens off the deck from length on off, defended.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, no run

Commentary: looks to flay this on the up through point but is beaten by the zip. There was width alright
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, no run

Commentary: works this off his hip towards deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, 1 run

Commentary: toe-ends the drive to mid-off.

Commentary: has a big swing at this, but is beaten by the late movement. Wanted to belt this over the long-on boundary
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, no run

Commentary: this slides in, scoots low and hits Lewis in front of the stumps. Really kept low, but Lewis has reviewed immediately. Surely he got an inside edge. Yes, yes. Replays confirm a big, fat inside edge onto the pitch. Decision overturned. Lewis survives.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, no run

Commentary: beaten as he looks to force this on the up through cover point.
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, no run

Commentary: steers this wide of square third man, aggressive running
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: one bounce over wide long-off. Backed away, made room and slapped this away

Commentary: tickles this off the thigh pad to the fine leg boundary.
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 4 leg byes

Commentary: clobbered back past the bowler. Friendly length ball and he muscled it away cross-batted.
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: driven past cover, splits the gap between the two infielders. Two quick runs
Commentary_short: Mohammad Saifuddin to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: whipped straight down the throat of Liton at deep midwicket. Got more elevation than distance because it was right off the toe-end. Intention right, though, with the stroke. Rony points to the sky in delight. It's not often you get a wicket off a juicy leg-stump half-volley.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Lewis, OUT
Dismissal_text: E Lewis c Liton Das b Abu Hider 1 (6b 0x4 0x6) SR: 16.66

Commentary: bunted into the off side for a quick single.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: ducks under this short ball that would've sailed over the batsman's head had he been still, wide called.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Pooran, 1 wide

Commentary: steers this late past short third man. Pooran off the mark with his very first delivery. Used the depth of the crease nicely to open the bat face late to play the stroke.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Pooran, FOUR runs

Commentary: looks to swing over the bowler's head, but played too early. Beaten
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Pooran, no run

Commentary: another swing and a miss.
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Pooran, no run

Commentary: short outside off, he swivels back and pulls this to the midwicket boundary
Commentary_short: Abu Hider to Pooran, FOUR runs

Commentary: muscled over mid-on. Right in the slot, went through on the up. Super hit.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: incredible use of the bottom hand to whip this over square leg, one bounce into the ropes. For a second, he was cramped for room, but did he adjust superbly or what.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: carved away over cover, two bounces into the ropes. Friendly length ball, made room and cracked this away over the infield. Exhilarating batting.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: goes downtown and connects magnificently. Falls just short of the ropes. Four in four now. He was almost waiting for this and when it arrived, went right over the top. Terrific followthrough, held pose for the cameras. Shows how much he enjoyed that
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, FOUR runs

Commentary: helped along towards fine leg, in comes the throw as the fielder runs across quickly.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 2 runs

Commentary: dug in short, slips out of his hand, goes down leg and bounces way over Mushfiqur's head. Five wides, Signs that he's rattled and is bowling without a plan currently. This raises the 50 for West Indies too.
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 5 wides

Commentary: flicked off the pads to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: lobs off a thickish inside edge towards deep midwicket. Nice flight, didn't quite come on. Dipped on him
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: swept ferociously into the stands at deep square. He fired this in and it just skidded on. Easily done.
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, SIX runs

Commentary: top-edges the sweep in trying to repeat the slog sweep, Tamim settles under the swirling ball at short fine leg. He may have been distracted by the square leg fielder in his eye line, but to his credit, he stayed away, allowing Tamim to complete the catch.
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Pooran, OUT
Dismissal_text: N Pooran c Tamim Iqbal b Shakib Al Hasan 14 (6b 2x4 1x6) SR: 233.33

Commentary: turns this with the angle towards long-on for an easy single.

Commentary: works this with the spin towards midwicket for a quick single
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

Commentary: drifting into middle and leg, squeezed to long-on.
Commentary_short: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

Commentary: driven firmly, but straight to cover. Just checked his shot, originally intended to hit this over cover.

Commentary: drifts in and skids on, Hetmyer gets a thick inside edge that rolls to fine leg. Mushfiqur appealed and the umpire raised his finger in a split-second. Hetmyer reviewed immediately, signaling to his partner that he hit it. And boy, that was a massive inside edge. You can't be giving such poor decisions on the field, Mr Gazi Sohel. Nerves on debut?
